headline: Xylem Boosts Portfolio With Acquisition of Majority Stake in Idrica
summary: The acquisition of a majority stake in Idrica is set to enable XYL to penetrate new markets and deliver intelligent solutions to its customers.

raw.headline: Xylem Boosts Portfolio With Acquisition of Majority Stake in Idrica
raw.summary: The acquisition of a majority stake in Idrica is set to enable XYL to penetrate new markets and deliver intelligent solutions to its customers.

headline: Xylem price target lowered to $166 from $172 at Stifel
summary: Stifel lowered the firm’s price target on Xylem (XYL) to $166 from $172 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. Global industrial stocks having materially outperformed the growth in earnings with 2024 EPS growth of 10% for the group, notes the analyst, who has “concerns in several areas,” but is “relatively bullish that growth will be similar in 2025.” However, the firm thinks stocks in the group “may have overshot the mark in the short term,” the analyst added. headline: Xylem (XYL): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q3 Earnings?
summary: Over the last six months, Xylem’s shares have sunk to $123.38, producing a disappointing 12.3% loss - a stark contrast to the S&P 500’s 12.1% gain. This was partly due to its softer quarterly results and may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
